name: The List (Hartoe)
description:
In the villages around the alps, children aren't only visited by Saint Nicholas. Companioning the bishop is a creature named Krampus. Together they set out to reward the good kids...and punish the bad ones. If you've been a good kid Saint Nick will give you a present. If you haven't been good, except to be whipped by Krampus' whip.

In this game you play as Santa and Krampus. You have a list of names and if they've been naughty or good, but you don't know where they are or how they look like. If you reward(or punish) all the kids on the list, you win the game.

Controls:
'A' & 'D': walk left and right
'W': Interact
'E': Give present/Whip
'Q': Show List
'Space': Change character
'Shift': Show map

Sadly this game is not finished as it misses most sprites, a lot of interactable objects and all sound.

This game was made in 48 hours for Quad Jam 2018.
